Author: painxiety
Text: You gain weight with the full intention of losing it again. You "do" all of the physical work but none of the emotional work. Outwardly, onlookers can breathe a sigh of relief, but they have no idea that the spirit inside of you is as broken as ever.

Author: angerexic
Text: for me im realising my previous recovery was actually pseudo because, though i ate pretty much what i wanted and gained weight, i still had a mental high weight that after i hit, i relapsed HARD :/ i never got rid of the self-hatred that fuelled my ed in the first place
